Detailed Description

Manpreet Kohli CS 340, Fall 2009

leveleditor.cpp: creates the design for the level editor by creating 20 * 27 semi-transparent blocks

00008     xPos = -375;
00009     yPos = -590;
00010 
00011     // draw all the transparent blocks for the level editor window
00012     for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++)
00013     {
00014         for (int j = 0; j < 27; j++)
00015         {
00016             Constants::blocks[i][j] = new EmptyBlock();
00017             theScene->addItem(Constants::blocks[i][j]);
00018             Constants::blocks[i][j]->setXPos(xPos);
00019             Constants::blocks[i][j]->setYPos(yPos);

00021             Constants::blocks[i][j]->setOpacity(0.4);
00022             Constants::blocks[i][j]->show();

00024         }
